host.description: Email server host name or IP address

port.description: Email SMTP port number. Please don't use port 25 as it is not safe

pass.description:
Email password. If you want to put the email.pass in values.yml, you must encrypt it.
If you don't want to put the password in the config file, you can use the following environment variable.
EMAIL_PASS=password

debug.description: Email debug mode. Default to true
